Text: Thank you for this upload. Sorry, as a beginner I don't know how to play/set up the wii console. The web is filled with different, difficult to understand info. Please help!

It is not all that difficult. You could call it complex, if you follow a good guide as you will find in http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5048117/Crash_s_v10_Wii_Modkit_-_All_regions_-_4.1_Firmware you will be fine. But you have to follow it to the letter. Read it several times before starting!
